name: questlog-workspace
description: Complete Web3 quest and badge system workspace

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run install:contracts
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:contracts
scripts.test:all: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:contracts
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.validate:all: npm run validate:env && npm run validate:deps && npm run build:all && npm run test:all
scripts.setup:dev: npm run install:all && npm run validate:all
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules questlog-*/node_modules questlog-*/dist questlog-*/build questlog-contracts/out questlog-contracts/cache

author: Questlog Team
